[
    EchoOpeningTag(
        Span(
            1,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Expression {
        expression: Literal(
            String(
                LiteralString {
                    value: ""<?php\n"",
                    span: Span(
                        1,
                        5,
                    ),
                },
            ),
        ),
        ending: CloseTag(
            Span(
                1,
                15,
            ),
        ),
    },
    InlineHtml(
        "\nsome html\n",
    ),
    FullOpeningTag(
        Span(
            3,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    Echo {
        echo: Span(
            4,
            5,
        ),
        values: [
            Literal(
                String(
                    LiteralString {
                        value: ""// "",
                        span: Span(
                            4,
                            10,
                        ),
                    },
                ),
            ),
        ],
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                4,
                15,
            ),
        ),
    },
    ClosingTag(
        Span(
            5,
            1,
        ),
    ),
    InlineHtml(
        "\n",
    ),
]
